main event: A civilian observed a black and white oblong object in Silver Springs, Maryland on March 8, 1964.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 4 feet long and 1 foot wide.,The object was observed flying at an altitude of about 100 feet.,It moved in a southeast direction at an estimated speed of 80 mph.,The sighting lasted for approximately 45 minutes.,No sound was heard during the sighting.
witness description: Two witnesses were driving in an automobile during the sighting.
